Package org.newsclub.net.unix.jetty

Class AFSocketClientConnector

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.io.ClientConnector
org.newsclub.net.unix.jetty.AFSocketClientConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Container, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable.DumpableContainer, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle
public final class AFSocketClientConnector extends org.eclipse.jetty.io.ClientConnector
A Connector implementation for junixsocket server socket channels (Unix domains etc.) Based upon jetty's ClientConnector. This implementation should work with jetty version 10.0.8 or newer.
Author:
Christian Kohlschütter
